job.title: Software Developer - Leader in Data Science + Media Tech
job.industry: Computer Software,Information Technology and Services,Information Services
job.description:
Are you a Software Developer with strong Python, Node or Java development skills looking to join a pioneer in the Data Science and Media Tech space? Are you a Software Developer (Python, Node or Java) who has strong server-side development experience and has worked with various API's? Are you a Software Developer who’s interested in building the first of its kind self-serve Audience Intelligence platform? Are you a Software Developer looking to join an emerging media tech company with core working hours, a relaxed working environment, work from home options, good benefits and a top tier team? If yes, continue reading….
Software Developer is needed for the Premier company in the Data Science and Marketing Technology Space. Entrenched in Algorithms that drive stronger relationships between Agencies, Brands and Consumers across all platforms (Social, Mobile, Web & TV), this is a firm that has been nominated as the top cross-channel video advertising software company year after year! They have a strong management team in place, tremendous client partnerships and client satisfaction enabling them to aggressively expand the team. The environment offers a ton of flexibility, allows for a lot of creativity, and you’ll have a strong voice in the overall development environment.
WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING:
Develop high traffic, large scale and concurrent web applications for both Agency and Brand customers
Architect high performance, scalable solutions for the first of its kind self-serve audience intelligence platform
Maintain and expand upon knowledge of multiple languages, frameworks, tools, devices, applications, and their capabilities
Design, develop, implement and maintain a flagship social integration platform
Create mechanisms for scraping data
Design and develop amazing customer friendly products
Develop models within distributed computing frameworks
Design and build complex applications with an emphasis on performance, scalability, and high reliability
Solve problems related to streaming user content, real time notifications, and large data sets
WHAT YOU NEED:
2+Years of Python, Node or Java experience (Backend in Python)
Modern Front-End skills with React, Angular or Ember (Front End in React)
Experience working with Large Data Sets
Experience with APIs and RESTful Web Services
Familiar with Kubernetes, Celery, Flask
Experience with large scale, concurrent applications is a plus
Familiar with MongoDB, MySQL or other NoSQL Databases
Strong problem-solving capabilities and exhibits strong Computer Science Fundamentals
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Math or similar
WHAT YOU WILL GET:
Competitive base salary
Full Benefits – Health, Dental, Vision and Life
Flexible working hours and environment
Ability to work remote / from home
401k with company matching up to 4%
Unlimited Vacation - Vacation-less policy
Maternity and Paternity leave
Fantastic new office space in the Chicago Loop
Cohesive team with a very autonomous & Creative work environment
Other company perks
So, if you’re a Software Developer who is interested in building out a first of its kind self-serve audience intelligence platform and like what you see above, please apply today.
